activities: Sandstorm Oasis is an online service for hosting web applications where the user might store a variety of information such as personal email, documents, etc.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: name, email address, profile picture or avatar, unique user ID corresponding to the login service(s) used to authenticate (e.g., Github username, if user logs in using Github), other personal information which the user add to their profile
